Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ServerMessageHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ServerMessageHandler
public class ServerMessageHandler extends Object
ServerMessageHandler class handles the answers from the server notifying the correct part of the GUI or CLI through property change listeners.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerMessageHandler

      public ServerMessageHandler(CLI cli, ModelView modelView)
      Constructor of the ServerMessageHandler in case players are using the CLI.
      Parameters:
      cli - of type CLI - the command line interface reference.
      modelView - of type ModelView - the structure, stored into the client, containing simple logic of the model.

    • ServerMessageHandler

      public ServerMessageHandler(GUI gui, ModelView modelView)
      Constructor of the ServerMessageHandler in case players are using the GUI.
      Parameters:
      gui - of type GUI - the graphical user interface reference.
      modelView - of type ModelView - the structure, stored into the client, containing simple logic of the model.

  • Method Details

    • answerHandler

      public void answerHandler()
      Method answerHandler handles the answer received from the server. It calls the client's listeners passing values relying on the type of message the server has sent.

    • setupMessageHandler

      public void setupMessageHandler(Answer answer)
      Method setupMessageHandler handles the answer received from the server.
      Parameters:
      answer - the setup message received.
